name: two by two basic beanie
sizes_available: baby, toddler, younger child, older child, small adult, large adult
notes:
this pattern is a basic beanie pattern, put together to use up my scraps to knit warm beanies for some of melbourne’s refugees. the hat comes in six sizes, from baby through to large adult. make them in any size, and they will be gratefully received and will keep someone warm this winter.

**size - approx head size - m/yds**
baby - 40cm (16”) - 55m/60yds 
toddler - 45cm (18”) - 65m/70yds 
younger child - 50cm (20”) - 75m/80yds 
older child - 52cm (21”) - 90m/100yds
sm adult - 55cm (22”) - 110m/120yds
lg adult - 60cm (24”) - 130m/145yds

the pattern includes options for working jogless stripes in the round, and has some simple colourwork charts.
